Package com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.admin.book

Class EditBookServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.epam.kkorolkov.finalproject.admin.book.EditBookServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet("/admin/edit-book")
public class EditBookServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The EditBookServlet is a servlet which task is to edit product if it exists in a database or to create one otherwise. doGet and doPost methods are overridden.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
              throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                     java.io.IOException
        doGet method handles GET request. Represents to an administrator a page with a form to edit or create a book.

        response - HttpServletResponse object provided by Tomcat.
        Throws:

        java.io.IOException - is thrown if an input or output exception occurs.

              throws DbException,
                     DaoException,

        setBook method creates an instance of Book class with field values retrieved from the request parameters.

        connection - an instance of Connection to reach the database.
        Returns:
        Book instance.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if query cannot be executed.
        DaoException - is thrown if DAO instance cannot be instantiated.
        BadRequestException - is thrown if request parameters are invalid.

      • getBook

        private Book getBook​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                     java.sql.Connection connection)
              throws DbException,
                     BadRequestException,
                     DaoException
        getBook method prepares instance of Book. If there is a book in the database with id provided in request parameter returns the corresponding instance Otherwise returns book stub provided by Book.create() method
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest object provided by Tomcat.
        connection - Connection object to process query.
        Returns:
        instance of Book.
        Throws:
        DbException - is thrown if there SQLException is thrown while querying database.
        BadRequestException - is thrown if parameter id is not valid id.
        DaoException - is thrown if an instance of DAO cannot be instantiated.
        See Also:
        Book.create()
